scripts.setup: pnpm install --ignore-scripts && pnpm --filter @mycelis/database exec prisma migrate dev --name init && pnpm --filter @mycelis/config run build && turbo run build --filter "./packages/*" && pnpm install -r
scripts.cleanup: npx shx rm -rf packages/*/dist && npx shx rm -rf apps/*/dist && pnpm run --filter @mycelis/frontend cleanup
